title: Gather Requirements for GravityWaveAnalyzer
description: Collaboratively collect and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the GravityWaveAnalyzer project. This includes identifying data sources, analysis techniques, output formats, performance expectations, potential scalability issues, security concerns, compliance requirements, as well as any constraints or assumptions. Consider potential future extensions, and address areas such as real-time processing, data visualization, and integration with existing astronomical databases.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data ingestion pipeline, data processing components, storage solutions, and user interfaces.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the components responsible for ingesting and preprocessing gravitational wave data from various sources.

title: Develop Data Processing Algorithms
description: Implement the algorithms and techniques for detecting and analyzing gravitational waves from the ingested data.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management solutions for raw data, processed data, and analysis results.

title: Build User Interfaces
description: Develop the user interfaces for visualizing and interacting with the gravitational wave data and analysis results.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and protect the system from unauthorized access.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the GravityWaveAnalyzer application.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the GravityWaveAnalyzer application.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the GravityWaveAnalyzer project, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
